citations.narrative:
At least 10 enclosures housing adult guinea pigs with their offspring have caking and hardened debris on the lip of the
self-feeders. A buildup of hardened debris, caking, and organic matter on self-feeders can expose the guinea pigs to
bacterial infections and other disease risks. Licensee must ensure that self-feeders are kept clean and sanitized at least
once every 2 weeks. Correct by May 9, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.29(d) 
   
Feeding. 
At least 10 enclosures housing adult guinea pigs with their offspring have caking and hardened debris on the lip of the 
self-feeders. A buildup of hardened debris, caking, and organic matter on self-feeders can expose the guinea pigs to 
bacterial infections and other disease risks. Licensee must ensure that self-feeders are kept clean and sanitized at least 
once every 2 weeks. Correct by May 9, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
